channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
So Fraxx stumped you guys. Tsk tsk.
Ashenvale, Splintertree Post, the back of the cave behind Loruk Foreststrider. Horde town, so Alliance is not welcome.
item.content:encoded:
So Fraxx stumped you guys. Tsk tsk.

Ashenvale, Splintertree Post, the back of the cave behind Loruk Foreststrider. Horde town, so Alliance is not welcome.

item.title: By: chicogrande
item.dc:creator: chicogrande
item.description: I'm agreeing with Byron. Looks like those caves in Blasted Lands, like the one with the big-ass felhunter in it.
item.content:encoded: I’m agreeing with Byron. Looks like those caves in Blasted Lands, like the one with the big-ass felhunter in it.

item.title: By: Acid
item.dc:creator: Acid
item.description: That looks like good ol' Onys lair to me.
item.content:encoded: That looks like good ol’ Onys lair to me.

item.title: By: Byron Ellacott
item.dc:creator: Byron Ellacott
item.description: There's a cave somewhat like that in the Blasted Lands, with the Burning Coven or some such cultist group in there. That cave would be my guess.
item.content:encoded: There’s a cave somewhat like that in the Blasted Lands, with the Burning Coven or some such cultist group in there. That cave would be my guess.

item.title: By: Docmdnite
item.dc:creator: Docmdnite
item.description: that looks like the basement of my last girl friend
item.content:encoded: that looks like the basement of my last girl friend

item.title: By: Mort
item.dc:creator: Mort
item.description: Im horde, and though it dos look similar i cant remember seeing the "crack of light from the ceiling" before, definitly need to check it out tomorrow.
item.content:encoded: Im horde, and though it dos look similar i cant remember seeing the “crack of light from the ceiling” before, definitly need to check it out tomorrow.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: I want to say Ragefire Chasm in Orgrimmar . . .
item.content:encoded: I want to say Ragefire Chasm in Orgrimmar . . .

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description:
i've been to gruul's more times than i care to count and i've never seen light from the top of the cave or a cauldron like that.
the tusks make me want to guess somewhere in BRS.
<blockquote>Probally some area where only 1% of players can even get to.</blockquote> i don't think so. it's not SSC or TK or Hyjal or BT. what else is difficult for anyone to experience? Gruul, Mag and Kara are on farm for pretty much everyone by now.
item.content:encoded:
i’ve been to gruul’s more times than i care to count and i’ve never seen light from the top of the cave or a cauldron like that.

the tusks make me want to guess somewhere in BRS.

Probally some area where only 1% of players can even get to.

i don’t think so. it’s not SSC or TK or Hyjal or BT. what else is difficult for anyone to experience? Gruul, Mag and Kara are on farm for pretty much everyone by now.

item.title: By: tcgiant
item.dc:creator: tcgiant
item.description: I'm gonna wager and guess either Gruul's Lair or that little cave with all the dragon-worshipping guys in Blade's Edge.
item.content:encoded: I’m gonna wager and guess either Gruul’s Lair or that little cave with all the dragon-worshipping guys in Blade’s Edge.

item.title: By: Annalyze
item.dc:creator: Annalyze
item.description: Probally some area where only 1% of players can even get to.
item.content:encoded: Probally some area where only 1% of players can even get to.
